Celia Adler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Celia_Adler 0 Celia Feinman Adler (December 6, 1889 – January 31, 1979) was an American actress, known as the "First Lady of the Yiddish Theatre". Celia_Feinman_Adler ( December_6_,_1889 – January_31_,_1979 ) was an_American_actress , known as the_"_First_Lady of the_Yiddish_Theatre_" .
